a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Diarrheal diseases death rate in people aged 70+, by risk
Estimated annual number of deaths from diarrheal diseases of those aged 70 and over per 100,000 people in the same age group.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2019)
Note: Risk factors can overlap for a given cause of death; therefore the sum of deaths attributed to risk factors may exceed the total number
